solution_line_template: If the total number of goals scored in the league that season against Barca is {total_goals_league}, the two players scored {percentage_by_two_players}*{total_goals_league}=<<{total_goals_league}*{percentage_by_two_players}={goals_by_two_players}>>{goals_by_two_players} goals.
If the players scored an equal number of goals, each scored {goals_by_two_players}/{number_of_players}=<<{goals_by_two_players}/{number_of_players}={goals_per_player}>>{goals_per_player} goals.
